Traits.Name: Evasive Maneuvering
Traits.Content: The Air Rod has advantage on Dexterity saving throws against effects that would cause it to be targeted or hit, as it can swiftly change direction in the air.

Traits.Name: Temporal Shift
Traits.Content: As a being that exists between moments, the Air Rod can phase through physical barriers, allowing it to move through objects and creatures without provoking opportunity attacks.

Actions.Name: Temporal Flicker
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +4 to hit, melee attack dealing 5 (1d6 + 2) force damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or have disadvantage on its next attack roll due to the disorienting effect of the Air Rod's swift movements.

Actions.Name: Airborne Surge
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +4 to hit, ranged attack dealing 5 (1d6 + 2) lightning damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn as the jolt of electricity disrupts its senses.
